) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNo} -1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNo} * #{amount}
mapper.insert:
select MAX(no)+1 from restaurant
insert into restaurant (mountain_no, rName, rLoc, contact, menu, description) values (#{mountain_no}, #{rName}, #{rLoc}, #{contact}, #{menu}, #{description})
